TABLE.NAME: h5pactivity
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the h5pactivity activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: displayoptions
FIELD.COMMENT: H5P Button display options

FIELD.NAME: enabletracking
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable xAPI tracking

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Which H5P attempt is used for grading

FIELD.NAME: h5pactivityid
FIELD.COMMENT: H5P activity ID

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Attempt user ID

FIELD.NAME: attempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Attempt number

FIELD.NAME: scaled
FIELD.COMMENT: Number 0..1 that reflects the performance of the learner

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of second inverted in that attempt (provided by the statement)

FIELD.NAME: completion
FIELD.COMMENT: Store the xAPI tracking completion result.

FIELD.NAME: success
FIELD.COMMENT: Store the xAPI tracking success result.

KEY.NAME: uq_activityuserattempt
KEY.COMMENT: Ensure a user cannot repeat the same attempt on the same activity

FIELD.NAME: attemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: h5pactivity_attempts ID

FIELD.NAME: correctpattern
FIELD.COMMENT: Correct Pattern in xAPI format

FIELD.NAME: response
FIELD.COMMENT: User response data in xAPI format

FIELD.NAME: additionals
FIELD.COMMENT: Extra subcontent information in JSON format

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Seconds inverted in this result (exctracted directly from statement)

FIELD.NAME: completion
FIELD.COMMENT: Store the xAPI tracking completion result.

FIELD.NAME: success
FIELD.COMMENT: Store the xAPI tracking success result.
